name: Zombie Walk
description:
Can you walk? Can you walk as a Zombie? I bet you can't!

Challenge yourself with this little zombie game. Walk, ride, slide, fly & jump. All this with Zombie! Find out if your friends are better. Measure how far you can go with your Zombie and rank better amongst all your friends.

This game is a collection of zombie mini games. You will love all of them.

Features:
- physics based zombie simulation
- great set of mini games
- top rank for best players
- lots of fun
